mishmash
--------

text processing
    find strings
    parse stuff

theory
    text processing automata : find regular pattern
    insertion sort and merge sort

text file graphics
    plot histograms
    plot text 'images'
    draw a cross a diamond a bowtie
    TREE MAPx8

math
    compute some sequences:
    fibo numbers and fibo words, convergent to sqrt
    root finding
    numerical derivation and integration
    advanced: symbolic math
    polar2cartesian
    dragon curve
    random walk
    logistic regression
    colinearity detection
    mandelbrot fractal

phys:
    model motion
    equipotential lines electric
    rezistor networks

anagram finder
numbers2english
percolation, game of life
string distances

ai
    a*
    8queens
    tictactoe

text formats and manippulation
    html
    simple template language

python stdlib

image drawing with pil
